refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets information about the garbage collector

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an associative array with the following elements:
"runs"
"collected"
"threshold"
"roots"
"running"
"protected"
"full"
"buffer_size"
"application_time"
"collector_time"
"destructor_time"
"free_time"
